presentationTable.name: Facts - Learning Costs
presentationTable.description: This folder provides metrics related to learner's time and expenses incurred due to assignment of various learning records

presentationColumns.name: Total Cost
presentationColumns.description: Provides the cost of all trainings enrolled by the learners

presentationColumns.name: Cost - Withdrawn Enrollments
presentationColumns.description: Provides the cost incurred on learning assignments that were withdrawn
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Enrollments.Cost - Withdrawn Enrollments

presentationColumns.name: Cost - Completed Enrollments
presentationColumns.description: Provides the cost incurred on learning assignments that were completed
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Enrollments.Cost - Completed Enrollments

presentationColumns.name: Average Cost per learner
presentationColumns.description: Provides the cost per person incurred across all learnings
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Enrollments.Average Cost per learner

presentationColumns.name: Cost - Terminated Learners
presentationColumns.description: Provides the cost of learning incurred by the workers that are currently terminated
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Enrollments.Cost - Terminated Learners

presentationColumns.name: Cost - Enrolled but not completed
presentationColumns.description: Provides the cost of incomplete learning incurred by workers
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Enrollments.Cost - Enrolled but not completed

presentationColumns.name: Cost - Bypass Completed Enrollments
presentationColumns.description: Provides the cost incurred on learning assignments that were bypass completed
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Enrollments.Cost - Bypass Completed Enrollments
